content: {A抱歉}<style=PlayerName>{me}</style>, thanks to your efforts, our planet's outdoor spaces now have a wonderful sense of life and energy. I hope you'll keep adding your unique touch to our planet!
info: 露卡瓶12-莫白_主流程文本II

content: This jar of <style=Highlight>Luca</style> is now full. Please take it and continue watering the Luca Arbor.
